/usr/bin/mpif90      -ffree-line-length-none -O3 CMakeFiles/piotest.dir/basic_tests.F90.o CMakeFiles/piotest.dir/driver.F90.o CMakeFiles/piotest.dir/global_vars.F90.o CMakeFiles/piotest.dir/ncdf_tests.F90.o CMakeFiles/piotest.dir/nc_set_log_level2.c.o  -o piotest  -L/home/mpas/Desktop/Source/pio/trunk/pio -rdynamic ../libpio.a /usr/lib/libpnetcdf.a -L/usr/lib -lnetcdff -L/usr/lib  -lnetcdf -Wl,-rpath,/home/mpas/Desktop/Source/pio/trunk/pio
